changeSet.author: Hitansu, Utsab
changeSet.comment: Ensuring required education details are not retired
changeSet.sql: update concept set retired=0, retire_reason=null where concept_id in (SELECT concept_id FROM concept_name WHERE name='Education Details'); update concept set retired=0, retire_reason=null where concept_id between (SELECT concept_id FROM concept_name WHERE name='Nursery' limit 1) and (SELECT concept_id FROM concept_name WHERE name='Other Education' limit 1);

changeSet.author: Utsab
changeSet.comment: Ensuring all the education are stored with uuid
